item.description:
Due to the severe and icy weather, I'm going to postpone this event. Sorry for any inconvience but I want everyone to be safe, and not drive out. Hope you understand and I hope to see you all out on the 25th :-)


I love having the waiters and chefs prepare food in front of you :-)

Enjoy this amazing cuisine and wonderful atmosphere with delicious food.

I love it here!!!!!


14 Wintonbury Mall Bloomfield, CT 06002




http://www.ginzacuisi...
item.how_to_find_us: Text or call John at 860-919-9782. If not then look for the only tall red head guy in the place :) Or you can text Jessica at 203-556-6130.
item.name: Ginza Japanese Restaurant in Bloomfield, CT
